英文公告.機關名稱: Mass Rapid Transit Engineering Office, Bureau Of High Speed Rail,MOTC
英文公告.機關地址: No.150, Min-an St., Zhonghe City, Taipei County 23502, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
英文公告.標案名稱: The Sequential Environmental Monitoring Operations of Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport Access MRT System Construction Project
英文公告.廠商地址: No.323, Yangguang St., Neihu Dist., Taipei City 114, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
英文公告.附加說明: This project is the sequential environmental monitoring operations. The contractor should implement the relevant sequential monitoring activities based on the environmental monitoring implemental plan of Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport Access MRT System Construction Project submitted by the Contractor CU01、CU02、CU02A、CU03、CE01B、CE01C、CE01D、CE02、CE03A and CE03B. The monitoring should last until the commencement of revenue service of Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport Access MRT System from Sanchong to Zhongli.The revenue service day is scheduled on June, 2013.
